title: GSoC Update 6-17
author: Max (Dockerization)
content:
This week plans

I'd like to tie up the flumotion components this week(by Tuesday or Wednesday) and get started on the build system. I need to do a little bit of testing on getting the components connected and make sure that's all working well.

Snippets for today

  • Worked on getting sshd running and configured properly with public key auth on the flumotion(encoder/collector) hosts so that pushconfigs.py will work.
  • Public keys for auth will need to be placed in sources/public_keys and the docker image will need to be built each time the public keys change, but I think this is the correct way to handle this given that the addition doesn't require extensive additional building
  • Did some reading on setting up Vagrant for the next part of the project
  • Drove back to SB from home, and did some moving into my new place!
Originally posted on Max Stritzinger
